name: Minnie & Max: Firefly Dash
description:
Join Minnie and Max on their first ever Adventure in Minnie and Max: Firefly Dash! 

Help bring Minnie, the adorable Shiba Inu, her favorite Insect: the beautiful fireflies! 

Max, the adventurous Pig, is ready on his skateboard to do exactly that! Don't make him wait and join this brazen Duo on their Ways!

Controls:

Spacebar to Jump & Double-Jump

Made in the ZenoJam 5: the Theme was "Light attracts Bugs"

Sprites: all self-made

Game Engine: Godot

Sounds: using tracks from freesound.org

Music: Fretless by Kevin MacLeod
